Tailwind CSS
Docs Examples Blog
Download

Based on HTML5 Boilerplate v7.3 https://html5boilerplate.com/

Boilerplate for webpack 4 with tailwindcss, PostCSS, Autoprefixer, browser-sync. Pre-configured webpack 4 with tailwind css as CSS framework, With PostCSS & Autoprefixer for most browser compatibility (IE10+), browser-sync to run the code throw local and public netowrk (For Mobile as example). Just Clone the project, then cd to the foloder then type npm i && npm start super easy to use.
